text: Pollo Tropical is a South Florida-based restaurant chain and franchise specializing in food inspired by Latin-Caribbean, particularly Cuban, and Floribbean cuisines. It was founded in 1988. It is headquartered in Doral, Florida. It is best known for marinated and grilled chicken and various sides including black beans and rice, mojo roast pork and more. Category:American restaurants Category:1988 establishments in the United States
title: Pollo Tropical
